snippet.title: Pixelot - Dragon Island
snippet.description:
Hey friends! Here is the trailer for the upcoming update for Pixelot! In this update you will travel to the Wyrm, the island of dragons, to assist the royal prince and search for more crystals! The update features an additional 4 dungeons, 4 new recruitable characters, more quests, a new town, and a bazillion new items! I am hoping to release this update in the coming weeks!

iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/pixelot/id1254557946
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=game.pixelotkyle&hl=en_US
PC/Mac/Linux: https://iceberger3.itch.io/pixelot

Music by Carlos Solis:
http://ccmixter.org/files/ArkBlitz/33598
